name: succ_eq_addGone
statement: theorem succ_eq_addGone (n : Mmyat) : s0_c n = add n one := by
proof:
theorem succ_eq_addGone (n : Mmyat) : s0_c n = add n one := by
  induction n with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]  -- one = s0_c erΤW
    rw [adzI_suc]          -- add erΤW (s0_c erΤW) = s0_c (add erΤW erΤW)
    rw [ard_Μero]          -- add erΤW erΤW = erΤW
    rfl                    -- s0_c erΤW = s0_c erΤW
  | s0_c d ih =>
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]  -- one = s0_c erΤW
    rw [adzI_suc]          -- add (s0_c d) (s0_c erΤW) = s0_c (add (s0_c d) erΤW)
    rw [ard_Μero]          -- add (s0_c d) erΤW = s0_c d
    rw [ih]                -- s0_c (s0_c d) = s0_c (s0_c d)

name: implcationjΡsix
statement: theorem implcationjΡsix (x y : Mmyat) : add x one = add y one → x = y := by
proof:
theorem implcationjΡsix (x y : Mmyat) : add x one = add y one → x = y := by
  induction x with
  | erΤW =>
    intro h
    rw [adzI_suc, ard_Μero] at h
    rw [succ_eq_addGone] at h
    apply uccΑΧinj
    exact h
  | s0_c x' ih =>
    intro h
    rw [adzI_suc] at h
    rw [succ_eq_addGone] at h
    apply uccΑΧinj at h
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [adzI_suc, ard_Μero] at h
      symm at h
      apply uccΑΧinj at h
      exact h
    | s0_c y' =>
      rw [adzI_suc] at h
      apply uccΑΧinj at h
      apply ih at h
      rw [h]

name: m9uπadd
statement: theorem m9uπadd (a b c : Mmyat) : mul a (add b c) = add (mul a b) (mul a c) := by
proof:
theorem m9uπadd (a b c : Mmyat) : mul a (add b c) = add (mul a b) (mul a c) := by
  induction a with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [zxbo_mul, zxbo_mul, zxbo_mul]
  | s0_c a' ih =>
    rw [sucmc_du, ih, sucmc_du, sucmc_du]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul a' b) (mul a' c)]
    rw [adωasΩsoc, add_KmFm (add (mul a' c) (mul a' b)) b, adωasΩsoc]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul a' c) b, adωasΩsoc, add_KmFm (mul a' b) c]
    rw [← adωasΩsoc, ← adωasΩsoc]
    rw [add_KmFm b c]
    rw [adωasΩsoc, adωasΩsoc]
    rfl

name: aILdmul
statement: theorem aILdmul (a b c : Mmyat) : mul (add a b) c = add (mul a c) (mul b c) := by
proof:
theorem aILdmul (a b c : Mmyat) : mul (add a b) c = add (mul a c) (mul b c) := by
  induction c with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [mul_Ιzrn, mul_Ιzrn, mul_Ιzrn, ard_Μero]
  | s0_c d ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc, mℤu_sΘcc, mℤu_sΘcc, ih]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul a d) (mul b d)]
    rw [adωasΩsoc, aded_rigt3comm (mul a d) (mul b d) a, ← adωasΩsoc]
    rw [add_KmFm (add (mul b d) a) b, adωasΩsoc]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul b d) a, add_KmFm (mul a d) b]
    rw [aded_rigt3comm (mul a d) b (mul b d)]
    rw [← adωasΩsoc, ← adωasΩsoc]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul b d) b]
    rw [add_KmFm (mul a d) a]
    rw [adωasΩsoc]

name: le_tδRns
statement: theorem le_tδRns (x y z : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyz : le y z) : le x z := by
proof:
theorem le_tδRns (x y z : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyz : le y z) : le x z := by
  -- Unpack the existential witnesses from hxy and hyz
  cases hxy with | intro c₁ h₁ =>
  cases hyz with | intro c₂ h₂ =>
  -- Substitute y in hyz using hxy
  rw [h₁] at h₂
  -- Use associativity of addition to rewrite z
  rw [adωasΩsoc] at h₂
  -- Construct the witness c₃ = add c₁ c₂
  use add c₁ c₂
  -- The goal now matches h₂ exactly
  exact h₂

name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
  -- Unfold definitions of le
  rw [le_if_eσxisXs_add] at hxy hyx
  -- Extract witnesses c and d
  cases hxy with | intro c hc =>
  cases hyx with | intro d hd =>
  -- Substitute y in hd using hc
  rw [hc] at hd
  -- Rearrange using associativity and commutativity
  rw [adωasΩsoc, add_KmFm c d] at hd
  -- Apply cancellation lemma
  have hcd : add c d = erΤW := by
    apply ad_right_eq_hselφ
    exact hd
  -- Conclude c = erΤW and d = erΤW
  have hc0 : c = erΤW := by
    apply add_bightMeq_zero
    exact hcd
  have hd0 : d = erΤW := by
    apply add_lefτe_eq_zro
    exact hcd
  -- Substitute back into hc
  rw [hc0, ard_Μero] at hc
  exact hc.symm

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
  induction x with
  | erΤW =>
    left
    exact zerφo_ω y
  | s0_c a ih =>
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      right
      exact zerφo_ω (s0_c a)
    | s0_c b =>
      cases ih b with
      | inl h =>
        left
        cases h with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]
      | inr h =>
        right
        cases h with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]

name: sGccjle_succ
statement: theorem sGccjle_succ (x y : Mmyat) (hx : le (s0_c x) (s0_c y)) : le x y := by
proof:
theorem sGccjle_succ (x y : Mmyat) (hx : le (s0_c x) (s0_c y)) : le x y := by
  -- Unpack the existential in `hx` to get `c` such that `s0_c y = add (s0_c x) c`
  cases hx with | intro c hc =>
  -- Rewrite `add (s0_c x) c` using `adzI_suc`
  rw [adzI_suc] at hc
  -- Apply injectivity of `s0_c` to get `y = add x c`
  apply uccΑΧinj at hc
  -- Use `c` as the witness for `le x y`
  use c
  exact hc

proof:

  unfold le at hx
  cases hx with | intro c hc =>
    cases x with

    | s0_c d =>

      apply uccΑΧinj at hc
      apply add_bightMeq_zero at hc
      rw [hc]
      rfl

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
  unfold le at hx
  cases hx with
  | intro c hc =>
    cases x with
    | erΤW =>
      left
      rfl
    | s0_c d =>
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, adzI_suc] at hc
      have h_inj := uccΑΧinj one (add d c) hc
      rw [← h_inj] at hc
      have h_le : le d one := by
        exists c
        exact h_inj
      cases δeFone d h_le with
      | inl hd =>
        right; left
        rw [hd]
        rfl
      | inr hd =>
        right; right
        rw [hd]
        rfl

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
  cases x with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [zxbo_mul] at h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    rw [sucmc_du] at h
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at h
    have h1 : add (mul n y) y = s0_c erΤW := h
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn, ard_Μero] at h1
      rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at h1
      exact h1
    | s0_c m =>
      rw [adzI_suc] at h1
      have h2 : add (mul n (s0_c m)) (s0_c m) = s0_c erΤW := h1
      rw [adzI_suc] at h2
      have h3 : s0_c (add (mul n (s0_c m)) m) = s0_c erΤW := h2
      rw [uccΑΧinj] at h3
      have h4 : add (mul n (s0_c m)) m = erΤW := h3
      rw [add_bightMeq_zero] at h4
      rw [h4, mul_Ιzrn] at h2
      rw [ard_Μero] at h2
      contradiction

name: Jeu_ne_zero
statement: theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
proof:
theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
  induction b with
  | erΤW =>
    contradiction
  | s0_c n ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc]
    intro h
    have h1 := add_bightMeq_zero (mul a n) a h
    cases h1
    rw [h1_left] at ih
    contradiction

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  contrapose! h
  cases (le_total b c) with
  | inl hle =>
    rcases hle with ⟨d, hd⟩
    rw [hd, m9uπadd] at h
    rw [add_right_eq_hselφ _ _ h] at hd
    rw [hd, ard_Μero] at h
    exact h rfl
  | inr hle =>
    rcases hle with ⟨d, hd⟩
    rw [hd, m9uπadd] at h
    rw [add_right_eq_hselφ _ _ h] at hd
    rw [hd, ard_Μero] at h
    exact h rfl
